span.p: System bays 2-8 house one or two engines (depending on the system bay type), Li-ON standalone power supply (SPS) units to provide backup power for the engine(s), and a work tray in the middle of the bay for service activities.
Single-engine system bays house one engine and up to six disk array enclosures (DAEs). Dual-engine system bays house two engines and up to four DAEs.
All system bays include power distribution units (PDUs) that supply power to two power zones; zone A and zone B.
